nodes.text: The Trianii were a species of bipedal felinoid sentients. In an attempt to impress a Trianii debutante, Lando Calrissian once swang at the Esoomian brawler Bumblethunk, who beat him down and stole the Smuggler's Guide from him. One Trianii was present in Weacoe city sometime before the Battle of Scarif.
The Trianii were created by Brian Daley for his novel Han Solo at Stars' End (1979). James Luceno canonized them when he included one in Catalyst: A Rogue One Novel (2016).
